author: taylor
msg: added locatorName parameter to several Profiler APIs
before this change, the profiler only looked up pages
now it has the capability to lookup other resources such as docsets
note: this commit requires changing your db schema

author: taylor
msg: moving the ServletPortlet to Portals Bridges under a new name GenericServletPortlet
While it is not a fully featured bridge, it does fall under (i think) the general re-usable portlet frameworks (oops) category
This portlet is not tied to jetspeed, i.e. it can be used in other JSR 168 portlets
